Row.Text: Decisions: Introduction
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Decisions[ENDCOLOR] are unique actions you can take to provide bonuses. These often cost Administrators and additional Yields.
Decisions: Administrators

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Administrators[ENDCOLOR] are the Resources used to enact most Decisions. These include Magistrates, Dignitaries, Captains, Clerics, and Inventors. Although you begin with 2 of each type (except Clerics, which you get 2 of when you found a Religion), Great People will need to be expended for additional Administrators.

Replace.Text: Indicates this City is the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_CONNECTED] Connecting other Cities to the Capital by Road will produce additional [ICON_GOLD] Gold.

Row.Text: Embrace the Enlightenment

The ideas of this new age are fast catching-on across the world. It would behoove us to take them up and embrace this age of Enlightenment. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted within the Enlightenment Era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_JFD_CAPTAIN] Captains. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_JFD_CLERIC] Clerics. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_JFD_DIGNITARY] Dignitaries. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_JFD_INVENTOR] Inventors. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain 'the Enlightened' Epithet, increasing the length of [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Ages by 10%. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age begins. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive a free [ICON_CULTURE] Social Policy.

Appoint a Commander

Soldiers that show great leadership potential should be recognised. We must honour this outstanding warrior with his elevation to the level of a commander. ------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have a Military Unit in the Capital. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Classical Era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per Era. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Promotes the garrisoned unit.

Hold a Military Parade

To both show the world our immense power and to keep our citizens in check, let us hold a military parade that is both entertaining and fearsome. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have a Military Unit in the Capital. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Industrial Era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per Era. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_JFD_CAPTAIN] Captains. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Ends [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance in all cities. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Clears [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance and [ICON_JFD_REVOLT] Revolt Sentiment in all cities. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_GOLD] Gold cost increases with each city.[ENDCOLOR]

Host a Grand Tournament

A benevolant ruler from time to time reminds the people to love and admire. So let us invite all to a great tournament and remind the people of our beneficence. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Medieval Era. Levy War Taxes

In this time of war, the people of our nation must rally together as one and donate their livelihoods to the cause of the nation's triumph against her foes. Those that do no agree will just have to be convinced... Militarize the Utilities

The state must be prepared for war at all times. The commercial interests of industries must yield to the needs of our Autocracy. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have adopted [ICON_IDEOLOGY_AUTOCRACY] Autocracy. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least 3 Factories. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. Perform Fertility Rites
Praise be to our carnal vigour! Let us summon our Clerics and have them perform the fertility rites of our faith![NEWLINE]
Perform Meditations
Praise be to inner peace! Let us summon our Clerics and have them teach us the ways of meditation![NEWLINE]
Perform Oral Traditions
Praise be to our sacred heroes! Let us summon our Clerics and have him spin tales of our ancient peoples![NEWLINE]
Perform Rites of Reverence
Praise be to the sacred ancestors! Let us summon our Clerics and have them perform the rites of reverence for our dead![NEWLINE]
Perform Sacred Mysteries
Praise be to the sacred divine! Let us summon our Clerics and have them perform the sacred mysteries of our faith![NEWLINE]
Perform Sun Ceremonies
Praise be to the divine sun! Let us summon our Clerics and have them perform ceremonies to honour its rise![NEWLINE]
Perform Nature Ceremonies
Praise be to the earth! Let us summon our Clerics and have them perform the sacred ceremonies of our faith![NEWLINE]
Perform Water Ceremonies
Praise be to the blessed waters! Let us summon our Clerics and have them perform the sacred ceremonies of our faith![NEWLINE]
Commission an Illustrated Holy Book
Books are expensive; a finely illustrated book is even more so. Regardless, as a faithful follower of {1_Religion}, we should obtain a copy.
{1_Desc}

Acquire the Tripitaka

The Buddhist scriptures, the Tripitaka, can take up to 40 separate books to contain. Without an easy way to reproduce them, they are naturally expensive and hard to come by. Nonetheless, we should try to acquire a set ourselves.[NEWLINE]

Commission a Biblical Manuscript

The act of reproducing and illustrating the Holy Bible by hand is extensive and laborious; naturally this means the manuscript can be quite costly. This should be no barrier to obtaining a copy for ourselves however.[NEWLINE]

Gather the Four Books and Five Classics

The Fours Books and Five Classics are the ancient texts that comprise the teachings of our faith. We would have these sacred works gathered and secured within our possession, so that they may be forever safe and never blemished.[NEWLINE]
Commission a Sefer Torah

The production of a Sefer Torah is a momentous thing; each of its 304,805 letters must be rendered by hand and the standards that must be met for the Sefer Torah to be valid are strict and specific. The resulting scroll is of course sacred and costly.[NEWLINE]
Obtain a Qur'anic Manuscript

A Qur'an is a magnificent thing; the calligraphic style alone can be a marvel. Of course, the fact that there is no way to reproduce it except by hand means that a copy will not come cheaply.[NEWLINE]
Obtain a Qur'anic Manuscript

A Qur'an is a magnificent thing; the calligraphic style alone can be a marvel. Of course, the fact that there is no way to reproduce it except by hand means that a copy will not come cheaply.[NEWLINE]
Obtain a Qur'anic Manuscript

A Qur'an is a magnificent thing; the calligraphic style alone can be a marvel. Of course, the fact that there is no way to reproduce it except by hand means that a copy will not come cheaply.[NEWLINE]
Localte the Emerald Tablet

The Emerald Tablet, the Smaragdine table, the Hermetica... It is the key to immortality and all manner of alchemical wonders. To locate this magnum opus would be quite the feat, and uncovering its secrets will require only the finest reagents.
Create the Bhagavad Gita

Our diverse faith, composed of many enlightened teachings on the ways of life and spirit, is an empowering force. We should synthesis these teachings into one scripture; the holy Bhagavad Gita, and unite our faithful beneath our common understandings.

Compile the Kojiki

There are many songs and poems that honour the spirits, but none yet so great as would be a single chronicle containing all. This would be an expensive task, but one truly worthy of our time.[NEWLINE]
Initiate the Guru Granth Sahib

Gurus have since past, contributing their wisdom and knowledge to their successors for centuries. Now is the time to compile all Gurbani into one sacred volume, the likes of which would become the perpetual authority on our faith.[NEWLINE]
Compile the Irk Bitig
Our shamans have received visions from Tengri Ülgen during their travels to the heavens. Let our scribes compile these omens so that they may guide us in times to come.[NEWLINE]
Patronise the compilation of the Daozang

The teachings of our sacred traditions are scattered throughout thousands of texts. Monks have long sought to compile these texts into one chronicle, but their efforts have thus far failed. It would be in keeping with the spirit of our traditions to patronise them in this endeavour.[NEWLINE]
Codify the Rites

The Tlenamacac grow old, and there ways to divine the future may be lost to the ages. This cannot be allowed to happen! A codex of fine amatl is in order, one containing the most intricate of tonalamatl. The days of the Lords of Night must also be precisely described, and details of the vital New Fire ceremony. There will be much sacrifice in coming days.
Compose the Avesta

Our faith comprises of many hymns and texts espousing the goodness of Zoroaster, but they are not one, and lie across many sacred works. Praise be upon the good king that would compose these texts into one holy collection.[NEWLINE]
Declare Repentance

We have sinned deeply! We have committed acts of such blasphemy that God Himself weeps for our soul! But we repent! We repent! We declare this public declaration of penitence in the hopes that our faithful subjects and the Heavens might forgive us! [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have a State Religion. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Piety level must be [COLOR_JFD_PIETY_POOR]Poor[ENDCOLOR] or lower. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_JFD_CLERIC] Clerics. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety.

{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has declared penitence for their sins, restoring their once lost piety.
Expel Religious Minorities

There are those that do not accept our religious ways. They undermine the legitimacy of our State Religion. Let us create an edict for a religious cleansing; those that do not submit to our faith will be denied the privilege of living within our borders and cast from the {1_GovtTitleShort}. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have a State Religion. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Piety level must be at least [COLOR_JFD_PIETY_NEUTRAL]Neutral[ENDCOLOR]. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_JFD_CLERIC] Clerics. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_GOLD] Gold cost increases with your total [ICON_CITIZEN] Population.[ENDCOLOR]

Hold Religious Celebration
Truly this has been a great era! Let us show our gratitude! Let us hold a grand celebration in honour of the Gods!
{1_Desc}

Go on Hajj to the Holy City
Going on a pilgrimage is one of the pillars of Islam, and this is something every able bodied Muslim is expected to do once in his life.
Perform a Purification Ritual
The sacred waters of the five rivers can purify us and make us ready to perform sacrifice. Let us cleanse our bodies so that we may honor the gods.
The Exalted Cranes
We build idols and pray for the blessing of Al-Lat, Al-Uzza, and Al-Manat; the exalted goddesses whose intercession is hoped for.
Sleep in the Royal Tombs
By sleeping on the tombs of our ancestors, they may visit us in our dreams and impart prophecy to aid our kingdom and community.
Kraal Sacrifice
Our sangoma fear that the amadholozi have grown displeased with our actions. We should sacrifice cattle in the umsamo of our chief to help placate and honour our ancestors.
Go on a Great Hunt

The angakkuq has returned from the world of the spirits and Sedna has promised to make the oceans plentiful. Let us embark on a great hunt to bring food and comfort to our people, and afterwards let us give thanks to the whale spirit for allowing us the hunt.
Write a Confession of Faith

Our churches have a long history of composing Confessions of Faith; formal declarations of belief. Though many serve as theses for debate, others seek unity between groups on controversial doctrines. Let us draft our own Confession in an effort to formalize doctrinal standards.
Celebrate the Feast of All-Saints
Let us commemorate in a humble feast the blessed saints who, unknown or known, have served to guide the word of God into our hearts and spirits.
Horns of Consecration
Let us construct an altar modeled from the horns of sacrificial oxen so that we may honor the gods and give libation.
Celebrate a Royal Jubilee
Great Pharaoh, the time has come to hold a royal jubilee and renew your divine right of kingship. Let us race the Apis bull and offer sacrifice to Aten.
Celebrate the Akitu

A new half year has begun and your subjects are already preparing a festival to celebrate the sowing of the barley. Let us move the statue of Ashur from the great house and honour his victory of Tiamat, renewing our great city and asking Ashur's blessings for the coming year.
Perform the Nineteen Day Fast

The Nineteen Day Fast was instituted by Bahá'u'lláh. Bringing together the community, it represents a period of meditation and prayer during which the believer must strive to make the necessary readjustments in his inner life and to refresh and reinvigorate his soul.
Celebrate the Feast of All-Saints
Let us commemorate in a humble feast the blessed saints who, unknown or known, have served to guide the word of God into our hearts and spirits.[NEWLINE]
Perform a Fertility Rite
We mold the woman into the shape of a bird, the shape of a snake, the shape of a frog. Just as the woman gives birth to the wheat and the quince, we ask the woman to give birth to a son.
Celebrate the Feast of All-Saints
Let us commemorate in a humble feast the blessed saints who, unknown or known, have served to guide the word of God into our hearts and spirits.[NEWLINE]
Hold a Buddhist Council
The Sangha have grown lax; interpretations of the Dhamma vary greatly between different monks. This is unacceptable. We must hold a council to resolve these matters and revitalise Buddhism.
Perform Lubuko
Only through divining the will of our ancestors can we hope to avoid misfortune. Let the nsengha drink mwavi and enter the realm of dreams in order to learn the will of the bankambo.
Symposium of the Sun
Let us hold a funerary feast to celebrate Ba'al Hamon's victory over Mot. Have our priests drink from the bronze cup and offer our children in sacrifice to ensure prosperity in the coming year.
Celebrate the Feast of All-Saints
Let us commemorate in a humble feast the blessed saints who, unknown or known, have served to guide the word of God into our hearts and spirits.[NEWLINE]
Celebrate the Feast of All-Saints
Let us commemorate in a humble feast the blessed saints who, unknown or known, have served to guide the word of God into our hearts and spirits.[NEWLINE]
Celebrate the Akitu

A new half year has begun and your subjects are already preparing a festival to celebrate the sowing of the barley. Let us move the statute of Marduk from the great house and honour his victory of Tiamat, renewing our great city and asking Marduk’s blessings for the coming year.
El Dorado
You must renew your kingship and be recognized by the tribal chiefs! Come, be anointed in gold as you journey to the great lagoon and make votive offerings to the gods.
Perform the Grand Ceremony

The Grand Ceremony at the Temple of Confucius is a celebration of music, song, and dance in honour of Confucius. Sacrifice is offered and ritual is conducted to develop traditional culture and create a harmonious society. Let us support the temple by contributing to this year's festivities.
Celebrate Samhain

The harvest season has come to an end and our people have begun feasting to celebrate the new year. Let us bring new fire into our houses as we put out the old, and allow our diviners to forecast the fate of the coming year.
Ziyarat al-Nabi Shu'ayb
Let us make a pilgrimage to the shrine of the Prophet Shu'ayb. Shu'ayb is the chief prophet of the Druze religion to whom God passed on his revelation directly before passing it on to Moses.
Call an Ecumenical Council
Many disagreements have arisen on doctrinal and disciplinary matters within the Church. These should be quickly resolved. A Ecumenical Council must be called.
Hold the Raan Festival
After the first new moon, we prepare the sacred shrines and holy places and make offerings of millet and milk to our ancestors.
Hold a Great Blot
Hold a great blot together with your vassals and offer sacrifice to the gods of Valhalla for good harvests and success on the battlefield.
Prepare the Hecatomb
Let us prepare the 100 cattle needed to offer sacrifice to the patron deity of our great city. Afterwards we shall mix wine and sing a joyous paean so that the gods may take pleasure in our voices.
Perform a Theurgic Ritual
By performing the ritual acts and identifying the divine sumbolon, the vehicle of our souls can align with the divine hierarchy and theurgic union can be achieved.
Create a Hand of Sabazios
A Hand of Sabazios is a bronze ritual hand used to adorn altars and carried during religious processions. On its palm and fingers we cast details of our rider god, Sabazios, and his great hunt.
Hold a Diwali Feast

Diwali is the traditional Hindu harvest feast. It celebrates the triumph of light over darkness, good over evil and hope over despair. Take special care this year, and make this year's feast one to be remembered.
Celebrate the Feast of All-Saints
Let us commemorate in a humble feast the blessed saints who, unknown or known, have served to guide the word of God into our hearts and spirits.[NEWLINE]
Apotheosis
Your honorable father has passed! Let the senate vote and elevate him to the rank of god so that we may better our lineage and strengthen imperial authority.
Celebrate the Inti Raymi

The winter solstice is fast approaching and already your subjects have begun to organize dances and processions for the festival. We should prepare sacrifice for Inti and Pachamama to ensure a good harvest in the coming season.
Go on Hajj to the Holy City
Going on a pilgrimage is one of the pillars of Islam, and this is something every able bodied Muslim is expected to do once in his life.
Hold an Egungun Festival

Through drumming and dance our priests can become one with our ancestors to teach and guide our community. Let us hold a festival to honour the dead and assure our ancestors their place among the living.
Mahavir Jayanti

Mahavir Jayanti is our most important holiday. During the festival we celebrate the birth of Mahavira; the twenty fourth and last Tirthankara. Let us prepare the rath yatra and carry the image of Mahavira through our cities on a chariot.
Celebrate Passover
Passover is celebrated every year to commemorate the liberation of the Jewish people from slavery. Spend lavishly and make this year's celebration one to be remembered!
Create a Kachina Doll
Our people strive for a closer connection to their ancestors. Let us create a vessel for the spirits, to protect us and provide good fortune in the coming season.
Perform a Cattle Sacrifice
Ngai has blessed us with rain and the grass has grown tall to feed our cattle! Let the laiboni offer sacrifice to give thanks and honor Ngai's gift.
Purulli Festival
My Lord, our land prospers and thrives as we approach the new year. Let Tarhun affirm your divine kingship as we celebrate his victory over Illuyanka.
Hold the Autumn Festival
Our subjects eagerly await the Autumn Festival. Let us don our animal masks and lead a procession to the mound temple so that we may offer sacrifice to the three gods.
Celebrate Makahiki
The Makahiki season has arrived and our warriors put down their spears to celebrate the new year. Let our priests offer ho'okupu to Lono, as our people feast and wrestle to prove their strength.
Baptize the Faithful
Baptism helps cleanse the material evil of the body, redeeming our soul and bringing it closer to salvation.
Commemoration of the Prophet
The prophet Mani offered us a vision of spiritual light of the world overcoming material darkness. We take a day to remember him and commemorate his birth as we read Manichaean scripture.
Midwinter Festival

The first new moon of the year symbolizes a time to give thanks to the spirits and renew our connection with nature. Let us stir the ashes of our hearths and have the midew cleanse the village before holding a great feast in honour of Nanabozho.
Construct a Mithraeum
A great cave lies in the mountains to our east. We should convert it into the image of the universe so that we may initiate others into the mysteries and hold our cultic meal.
Celebrate Pioneer Day
On this day we celebrate our Mormon brothers and sisters who first settled these lands after being forced from their homes. Let us hold parades and other festivities to help commemorate the event.
Perform a Bear Sacrifice
The end of winter approaches. Let us capture a newborn bear cub so that we may send it off to the world of the gods.
Go on Hajj to the Holy City
Going on a pilgrimage is one of the pillars of Islam, and this is something every able bodied Muslim is expected to do once in his life.
Celebrate the Akitu

A new half year has begun and your subjects are already preparing a festival to celebrate the sowing of the barley. Let us move the statue of Kiririsha from the great house to the sea, renewing our great city and asking Kiririsha's blessings for the coming year.
Perform a Theurgic Ritual
By performing the ritual acts and identifying the divine sumbolon, the vehicle of our souls can align with the divine hierarchy and theurgic union can be achieved.
Hold a Drum Ceremony
The noaidi can mediate between this world and the next. Let us hold a ceremony so that they may journey to saivo and negotiate with the spirits and forefathers to improve our fate.
Perform a Healing Dance
Tell the healers to prepare the night dance to aid our community. Let them tie the offerings to the trees and bang their drums to contact the spirits of our ancestors.
Perform Haruspicy
Let us sacrifice a newborn sheep and examine its liver for omens so that we may better discern the will of the gods.
Create a Nkisi
Our people strive for a closer connection to their ancestors. Let us create a vessel for the spirits to protect us and provide good fortune in the coming season.
Create an Ikenga
Our people strive for a closer connection to their ancestors. Let us create a vessel for the spirits, to protect us and provide good fortune in the coming season.
Hold the Yam Festival

The Yam Festival is a five day feast marking the first yam harvest following the monsoon season. It is a time for us to thank Nyame and the spirits of our ancestors as we come together in peace and community.
Celebrate the Feast of All-Saints
Let us commemorate in a humble feast the blessed saints who, unknown or known, have served to guide the word of God into our hearts and spirits.[NEWLINE]
Midwinter Festival

The first new moon of the year symbolizes a time to give thanks to the spirits and renew our connection with them. Let us stir the ashes of our hearths and have the False Face cleanse the village before holding a great feast in honour of Hahgwehdiyu.
Celebrate the Inti Raymi

The winter solstice is fast approaching and already your subjects have begun to organize dances and processions for the festival. We should prepare sacrifice for Inti and Pachamama to ensure a good harvest in the coming season.
Collect Medicinal Herbs

A sickness is spreading through our empire and the paje inform us that a maleficent spirit is attacking the souls of the poor. We need to collect a new supply of sacred herbs so that the paje may enter the spirit world and combat this evil.
Heb-Sed Festival
Great Pharaoh, the time has come to hold a royal jubilee and renew your divine right of kingship. Let us race the Apis bull and offer sacrifice to Ma'at and Wadjit.
Organize a Father Dance
It is through dance and song that we direct the heart of the spirits. Let us gather and hold a round dance to give thanks to A'po for the coming season.
Write a Confession of Faith

Our churches have a long history of composing Confessions of Faith; formal declarations of belief. Though many serve as theses for debate, others seek unity between groups on controversial doctrines. Let us draft our own Confession in an effort to formalize doctrinal standards.
Celebrate Makahiki
The Makahiki season has arrived and our warriors put down their spears to celebrate the new year. Let our priests offer ho'okupu to Lono, as our people feast and wrestle to prove their strength.
Turning of the Bones

The spirits of the dead only join the world of the ancestors after their bodies fully decompose. We must observe the famadihana tradition and exhume our ancestors so that we may rewrap them in fresh cloth. By marking the occasion with song and dance we bring together the spirits of the living and the dead and grow as a community.
Hold a RozhanitsyMeal
At the end of year we invoke the great god Rod to honor mothers and midwives and ensure the birth of strong sons in the following season.
Hold a Kurgan Burial
A great hero has died! Let us build a great barrow and fill his burial chamber with gold as we sacrifice a horse to honor his spirit.
Perform a Bear Sacrifice
The end of winter approaches. Let us capture a newborn bear cub so that we may send it off to the world of the gods.
Obtain the Elekes

In order to be initiated into the faith, we must receive the protection and blessing of the Orichas. We must receive the colored beads of Elegua, Obatala, Yemaya, Chango, and Ochun and fasten a necklace to be bathed in blood.
Conduct a Baci Ceremony

Through the Baci we synchronize the thirty-two components of the soul. By observing the ritual we can establish social and familial bonds to maintain the balance and harmony of the individual and community.
Carve a Transformation Mask

Masks play an important role in our religious ceremonies; displaying the crest of our ancestors and their relationship with the spirits of nature. When we wear the mask with song and dance, we transform into the animal spirit and call upon our ancestors for help and guidance.
Rebuild the Ise-Jingu

The Ise-Jingu is one of our most sacred shrines, dedicated to the goddess Amaterasu and housing the sacred Yata no Kagami. Every 20 years we dismantle and rebuild the shrine as an act of renewal and purification. Let us hold festivals to celebrate the event and contribute to the rebuilding ceremony.
Perform a Lingam Offering
The lingam represents the great Shiva. Let us prepare the lingam as well as the yoni of his consort and pour offerings of milk and ghee.
Gurpurab of Guru Nanak

Kartik Puranmashi has arrived and we celebrate the birth of our founder and spiritual leader Guru Nanak. Let us recite the sacred texts in our gurdwaras and hold a procession of song and swordsmanship to reaffirm our devotion.
Celebrate the Akitu

A new half year has begun and your subjects are already preparing a festival to celebrate the sowing of the barley. Let us move the statute of Anu from the great house and honour his victory of Nammu, renewing our great city and asking Anu's blessings for the coming year.
Hold a Rozhanitsy Meal
At the end of year we invoke the great god Rod to honor mothers and midwives and ensure the birth of strong sons in the following season.
Construct a Ceremonial Mound
Let us gather the community and raise earth to shape a great mound for our temples and burial sites.
Perform the Chiao

The Chiao is a rite of cosmic renewal which brings order and restores the balance of the universe and the community. Let us sponsor festivities and processions for the local villages, as our priests dedicate our offerings to the gods and ask them to bring us peace and prosperity.
Sacrifice to the Yer-Sub
We must appease the spirits of nature and of our ancestors. Before we feast, let us hang the white ram from a tree and sacrifice the red horse to ensure the fertility of our cattle.
Reform the Sangha

Buddhism has a tendency to mingle with local beliefs and incorporate them. We should remove these superstitious beliefs from the Buddhist monastic order and take this opportunity to bring the doctrines of Buddhism in line with our furthered understanding of the natural world.
Perform the Xiuhmolpilli
The Binding of the Years is approaching as our calendar completes its cycle. Our subjects should fast as the priests of Huehueteotl prepare the sacrifice to light the new sacred fire.
Hold an Initiation Ceremony

A few of our youth have reached the aged of manhood. Let the elders take them into the bush and teach them the sacred songs and dances of the dreaming before they are painted with white ochre and circumcised so that they may be accepted as warriors.
Festival of Chicckaban

During the month of Xul we hold a festival dedicated to the great Feathered Serpent. Let us burn incense and bring offerings to the temples so that Kulkulcan may descend from the heavens and collect his sacrifice.
Search for the New Dalai Lama
His Holiness the Dalai Lama has passed from this earth! Let us begin our search for his reincarnation that we might bring him to lead the Buddhist order once again.
Perform a Fire Sacrifice
The sacrifice is an act of cosmic renewal. Through Agni, the sacrificial fire, we destroy an object in the world of man so that we may renew that object in the world of the gods.
Draw a Veve
Great Houngan, we must prepare for the coming ritual. Let us draw the veve on the floor with red brick powder so that the Loas may descend to earth.
Hold a Sun Dance
Our people wish to hold a sun dance to give thanks and renewal to the Great Spirit. Let our warriors pierce their skin and offer themselves as prayer for the benefit of their family and band.
Nguillatun Festival

During the full moon of harvest season, our community comes together to celebrate the Nguillatun and give thanks for our good fortune. Let the machi play the kultrun and pifilka to reestablish balance and heal the natural order.
Feast of the Assembly

Once a year we hold a seven day festival to reaffirm our community and sense of identity. During this time, all able bodied Yazidi should endeavor to make a pilgrimage to the tomb of Sheikh Adi ibn Musafir in Lalis where we sacrifice an ox to mark the end of summer.
Create a Zemi
Our people strive for a closer connection to their ancestors. Let us create a vessel for the spirits, to protect us and provide good fortune in the coming season.
Celebrate Sadeh

At the start of the long winter we gather to celebrate Sadeh. Along our rivers and in our temples, let us light huge bonfires to assist the revival of the sun and its summer light as we fight off the demons of cold and darkness.
Dispatch Emissaries

There are no doubt other leaders in this would with whom we would wish to foster peace and trade. Let us dispatch emissaries to seek them out. Our quest towards a culturally cultivated society begins here. Our artistic wonders will go down in history as the most marvelous of this era of any civilization. It is no business of the government to play God in the economy. We must release our grip upon the industries and pursue the Freedom of our factories. Compile Code of Laws

Over the years various laws and decrees have been accumulated. In the interests of efficacy it would be prudent to codify these into a single corpus of law so everyone will know their rights and duties. Our bureaucracy offers to formalize the weights and measures system. Our quest towards a technologically progressive society begins here. Our scientific wonders will go down in history as the most marvelous of this era of any civilization. Nationalize the Utilities

The welfare of the workers of the world is at the heart of our functioning society. Let us nationalise those industries which are essential and show the world that prosperity lies in Order. Emancipation Proclamation

The following, to wit: All persons held as slaves, the people whereof shall then be in rebellion against the United States, shall be then, thenceforward, and forever free; and the Executive Government of the United States, including the military and naval authority thereof, will recognize and maintain the freedom of such persons, and will do no act or acts to repress such persons, or any of them, in any efforts they may make for their actual freedom. Replace.Text: The Ishtar Gate was constructed by the Babylonian King Nebuchadnezzar II circa 575 BCE. It was the eighth gate of the city of Babylon (in present day Iraq) and was the main entrance into the city. The Ishtar Gate was part of Nebuchadnezzar's plan to beautify his empire's capital and during the first half of the 6th century BCE, he also restored the temple of Marduk and built the renowned wonder: the Hanging Gardens as part of this plan. The magnificence of the Ishtar Gate was so well known that it made the initial list of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World. However, it was later replaced by the Lighthouse of Alexandria, but some authors (Antipater of Sidon and Calliamchus of Cyrene) wrote that the "Gates of Ishtar" and "Walls of Babylon" should still be considered one of the wonders.
+2 [ICON_FOOD] Food from all Walls.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]May only be acquired by Babylon through the "Construct the Ishtar Gate" decision.

Replace.Text: Enemy land Units must expend 1 extra [ICON_MOVES] movement per Tile if they move into a Tile worked by this City.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]May only be acquired by Byzantium through the "Raise the Theodosian Walls" decision.

The despair of its enemies, the walls of Constantinople were the most famous of the medieval world, singular not only in scale, but in their construction and design, which integrated man-made defenses with natural obstacles. Their principal composition was mortared rubble, faced with blocks of fitted limestone and reinforced by courses of layered red brick. To enhance the integrity of the overall network, the towers and walls were built independently of one another. The entire city was enclosed in a defensive circuit of 14 miles of walls, reinforced by more than 400 towers and bastions, and several strong points and fortresses. The strongest construction faced west, against an approach by land. There, along a four-mile stretch of rolling land, stand the legendary Theodosian Walls, their depths blending together, the merlons overlapping like teeth in the mouth of an Olympian shark. There an enemy had to attack a linear obstacle of four belts, each ascending above the other, with a depth of some 200 feet.

Replace.Text: The German Bundesrat is a legislative body that represents the sixteen Länder (federal states) of Germany at the national level. The Bundesrat meets at the former Prussian House of Lords in Berlin. Its second seat is located in the former West German capital Bonn. The Bundesrat participates in legislation, alongside the Bundestag, the directly elected representation of the people of Germany, with laws affecting state competences and all constitutional changes requiring the consent of the body. Functioning similarly, it is often described as an upper house along the lines of US Senate, the Canadian Senate or the British House of Lords, although the German constitution does not declare the Bundestag and Bundesrat to form houses of a bicameral parliament. Officially, it is generally referred to as a "constitutional body" alongside the Bundestag, the Federal President, the Federal Cabinet and the Federal Constitutional Court.

1 Free Social Policy. +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness for every conquered or allied City-State.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]May only be acquired by Germany through the "Consolidate the German Confederation" decision.

Row.Text: Regulate the Zünfte

Our great cities formed around the Zünfte - the guilds. It is no surprise then that they have gained considerable power. But they must be subject to our laws and regulations if they are to be integrated into the German state. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_INVEST] Investments are 10% cheaper.

Our great cities formed around the Zünfte - the guilds. It is no surprise then that they have gained considerable power. But they must be subject to our laws and regulations if they are to be integrated into the German state. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Build Hansen in half the usual time. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_INVEST] Investments are 10% cheaper.
Rally the Philhellenes

The minds of the world are captivated by our ancient history and intrigued by our culture, and the numbers of Philhellenes swell by the day. We should make sure that our foreign friends help us in times of need. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be Greece. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Industrial Era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have completed at least 2 Social Policy trees. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be allied to at least 3 City-States. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_JFD_DIGNITARY] Dignitaries. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Allied City-States will gift Military Units whenever Greece enters into war against a major civilization.

The minds of the world are captivated by our ancient history and intrigued by our culture, and the numbers of Philhellenes swell by the day. We should make sure that our foreign friends help us in times of need. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Allied City-States will gift Military Units whenever Greece enters into war against a major civilization.
The Philhellenes of the world rally to your aid, sending you troops to help in your struggle!
Develop the Phalanx formation

War never changes, but tactics do. The old hoplite formation is obsolete and no longer fit for the fields of battle. We should make use of the sarissa pike and instruct our warriors to wield it with skill and in unison. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be Greece. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least 5 Hoplites. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Iron Working. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_JFD_CAPTAIN] Captains. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All Hoplites are instantly upgraded to Pikemen and gain the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]"Phalanx"[ENDCOLOR] Promotion

Row.Text: Found the House of Worship

Many ancient faiths lie scattered throughout our empire, espousing sacred philosophy and ruminative worship. But these faiths all share a common unity,and for the good of the empire, should be converged into one. Let us found a place for spiritual leaders to come and discuss their faiths, that one they they might be reconciled. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be India. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have more than one Religion present in your civilization. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_JFD_CLERIC] Clerics. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 [ICON_PEACE] Faith for every citizen in the Capital.

[NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 [ICON_PEACE] Faith for every citizen in the Capital.
Standardise the Devanagari Script

Sanskrit is one of our most ancient and sacred languages, but is weighed down by disunity in its application. Let us standardise one alphabet across the empire to be used as the written form of our most sacred tongue. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be India. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Medieval Era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_JFD_CLERIC] Clerics. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive a lump sum of [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and [ICON_RESEARCH] Science whenever a City grows. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and [ICON_RESEARCH] Science increase with the size of the City.[ENDCOLOR]

Devanagari.
Sumpah Palapa

{1_Desc} [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be Indonesia. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be at War. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least 3 units with the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Mystic Blade[ENDCOLOR] or related Promotions. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. I, Gajah Mada, as {1_LeaderTitle}, will not taste food with spices if I have not united Indonesia. I will not taste food with spices if I have not defeated our foes.
I, Gajah Mada, as {1_LeaderTitle}, will not taste food with spices if I have not united Indonesia. I will not taste food with spices if I have not defeated {2_WarList}.
Take Control of the Spice Trade

Nutmeg, clover, humble black pepper. Every grain is worth its weight in gold in the eyes of those cursed with less spicy national cuisines. Our spices' desirability abroad puts us in a position to dominate in international trade. ------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be Indonesia. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have a local source of at least 1 of the following: {1_Resources}. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_JFD_DIGNITARY] Dignitaries. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_JFD_INVENTORY] Inventors. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain 2 [ICON_SWAP] Trade Route slots. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 Cargo Ships appear in the Capital.

{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has secured a monopoly over the Spice Trade.
Develop Castle Towns

The Jōkamachi - Castle Towns - are our most precious cities. They are defensible and prosperous. Their continued development should take the highest precedence. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be Japan. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have Castles in at least 50% of their cities. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_JFD_CAPTAIN] Captains. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Castles yield +0.2 [ICON_JFD_DEVELOPMENT] Development, +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold, and +3 [ICON_STRENGTH] Defense. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_GOLD] Gold cost increases with each Castle.[ENDCOLOR]

The Jōkamachi - Castle Towns - are our most precious cities. They are defensible and prosperous. Their continued development should take the highest precedence. Patronise the Theatres

The arts are flourishing in Japan. Actors and musicians carry our culture and tell our land's history throughout the country. Whether it's the stately Noh, or the extravagant Kabuki, our theatre is, by far, the most important. We should reward our artists for their tireless efforts. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be Japan. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least one Amphitheatre. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least one Opera House. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_JFD_DIGNITARY] Dignitaries. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A Great Musician appears. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Amphitheatres and Opera Houses yield +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness.

[NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A Great Musician appears. Introduce Hangul

The current writing system we use is woefully unsuited to the Korean language. While the elite may have time to waste memorising thousands of characters for most commoners this only serves as an unnecessary barrier against the spread of knowledge. At your command, our scholars shall strive to create an alphabet uniquely suited to Korean, which will allow all our people to be able to read and write. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be Korea. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Renaissance Era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_RESEARCH] Science. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]3 [ICON_JFD_INVENTOR] Inventors. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science from Farms.

Hangul
Hangul.
Subsidise Gunpowder Weaponry

The Hwach'a has shown itself to be a fearsome weapon, proving once and for all the utility that gunpowder could have in the Korean Army. It is only logical that we should continue to research the possible militaristic uses of gunpowder. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be Korea. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Physics. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_JFD_CAPTAIN] Captains. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when training Gunpowder and Siege units.

Incorporate Subdued Peoples

The {1_LeaderTitle} is a great conqueror, but he is a great master too. Instead of driving defeated tribes away, or enslaving them, he has decreed to incorporate them into our own, and let them seek glory under the banners of the {1_LeaderTitle}. Such an act of mercy and benevolence will inspire loyalty unseen before. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be Mongolia, [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have conquered at least one Capital. [ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of Medieval Era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]3 [ICON_JFD_CAPTAIN] Captains. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Courthouses are built at double speed. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Courthouses yield +4 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.

Such an act of mercy and benevolence will inspire loyalty unseen before. Establish the Yam

The Horde swept across the lands like a deadly wind. Our lands are bound only by the horizon. Trade can now flourish, safe from banditry and foreign incursions. Let us establish a system of checkpoints throughout our trade routes that both our messengers and merchants may use to rest and recuperate, then continue on their way. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be Mongolia. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least 5 cities. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have all Trade Route slots filled. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of Medieval Era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+50% Land Trade Route range. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All Trade Routes have +1 Sight and reveal Fog of War when travelling.

Establish the Black Guard

We have tamed the desert, and gained the allegiance of many tribes that dwell there. The most fiercely loyal are the people of the darkest skin. We should train them and make them the backbone of our army.[NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be Morocco. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May be enacted from the beginning of the Renaissance Era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have built at least five Kasbahs. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. Initiate Plunder Campaign

Our rivals grow richer and richer, filling their coffers with stolen gold. We cannot stay behind, lest we become destitute and irrelevant on the world stage. We need to find more funds; even if it means getting them abroad. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be Morocco. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Gunpowder. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_JFD_CAPTAIN] Captains. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Units gain [ICON_GOLD] Gold from kills.

Reform the Satrapies

Our {1_GovtTitleShort} is vast and many peoples populate it. We should ensure that our governors are accustomed to local local traditions and politics, to ensure peace and stability in our most remote lands. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be Persia. [ICON_BULLET]Satrap's Courts yield +5% [ICON_JFD_BLUE_FIST] Loyalty.

Create the Savaran Cavalry

The times are changing. The armoured horseman is now king on the battlefield. To keep up with our foes, our noble hosts must be re-organized into the new Savaran cavalry. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be Persia. Hold a Great Sejm

In this age of reason, the need for deliberation on matters of state is great. We cannot afford for allegiances to shift, and must therefore delay the creation of a new parliament. Establish the Jagiellonian University

The fate of the {1_GovtTitleShort} doesn't rely solely on the might of its army. In times of peace, a force of scholars, lawyers, and doctors is what keeps the realm strong. Thus, let us found a place of higher learning, to ensure that Poland will always have an educated elite it deserves. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be Poland. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Medieval Era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_JFD_DIGNITARY] Dignitaries. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Jagiellonian University is built in the Capital.

The fate of the {1_GovtTitleShort} doesn't rely solely on the might of its army. In times of peace, a force of scholars, lawyers, and doctors is what keeps the realm strong. {1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has founded the prestigious Jagiellonian University in {3_CapitalName}.

Replace.Text: Boosts city [ICON_CULTURE] Culture output by 10%. +25% [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People generation in this City.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]May only be acquired by Poland through the "Establish the Main Crown School" decision.

The Jagiellonian University, or The Main Crown School, is a research university founded in 1364 by Casimir III the Great in Kazimierz (since 1791 a district of Kraków). It is the oldest university in Poland, the second oldest university in Central Europe (after Charles University in Prague) and one of the oldest universities in the world.

Row.Text: Proclaim the Kanawai Mamalahoe

Let us bring peace to our people by proclaiming the Kanawai Mamalahoe; the Law of the Splintered Paddle, that every elderly person, woman, and child might lie by the roadside in safety. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be Polynesia. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have 5 Military Units or more. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A {2_Turns}-turn [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age begins. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_GOLD] Gold cost increases with the number of units.[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Note: The length of the [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age increases with the number of units.[ENDCOLOR]

Revive the Runanga

Foreign invaders threaten our way of life and the safety of our people. We must band together as one and revive the ancient Runanga - war councils - such that we might prepare for their arrival. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be Polynesia. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be at War. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have a Government. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]There must be a Unit with the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Haka War Dance[ENDCOLOR] Promotion in the Capital. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least {1_Num}% [ICON_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY] Sovereignty. [ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Unit is disbanded. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_JFD_CAPTAIN] Captains. Institute the Casa da Índia

Our colonies are at the centre of our prosperity. But it is marred wounded by ill management, and trade opportunities have slipped beyond our reach. Let us consolidate all trade beneath the authority of one economic institution; the Casa da Índia, to ensure that all trade flows through Portugal. ------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be Portugal. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least 3 [ICON_JFD_COLONY] Colonies. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Renaissance Era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Constructs the East India Company in the Capital. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Governor's Mansions yield +10% [ICON_GOLD] Gold.

Collect Trade Taxes

With each feitoria established, the state has bestowed a grant to ensure its prosperity. In return, the feitoria manages all taxation on trade that passes through it, which belongs to the state. It is time for that grant to pay off, and to collect those taxes that rightfully belong to Portugal. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be Portugal. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must own at least 3 Feitorias. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per Era. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_GOLD] Gold reward increases with the number of Feitorias.[ENDCOLOR]

Introduce Concrete

The development of concrete has transformed construction methods. Sturdier and more elaborate works are now possible. We should put concrete to use immediately. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be Rome. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Engineering. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. Panem et Circenses

Already long ago, from when we sold our vote to no man, the People have abdicated our duties; for the People who once upon a time handed out military command, high civil office, legions - everything, now restrains itself and anxiously hopes for just two things: bread and circuses. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be Rome. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Classical Era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per Era. Create the Thai Alphabet

King Ramkhamhaeng is traditionally held to be the creator of the Thai Alphabet; a complex script with 44 consonants, 15 vowel symbols that combine into at least 28 vowel forms, and 4 tone diacritics. Send Out Embassies

We have often sent lavish gifts and embassies to the many lesser nations to show to them our might and goodwill. Let us do so again on an unprecedented scale! We shall proclaim to the world the glory of Siam, so that we might properly and permanently establish our position as the greatest empire on earth! [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be Siam. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must know at least 4 City-States. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be at Peace. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Renaissance era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_JFD_DIGNITARY] Dignitaries. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive between +10 and +40 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with all met City-States. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The resting point for [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with all City-States is increased by 5. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_GOLD] Gold cost increases with each known City-State.[ENDCOLOR]

Recruit Scholars for Sankoré University

In order for Songhai to truly be great, we must not neglect the cultural and intellectual needs of our people. Let us recruit Scholars to staff the Sankoré Madrasah and the many other centres of learning within the nation. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be Songhai. Police our Trade Routes

Our army needs gold to support it, gold which we earn through trade. We would do well to dedicate some of our troops and funds to protecting our merchants; helping to ensure a continual flow of money into the {1_GovtTitle}. Fund Columbus's Expedition

Explorer Christopher Columbus has been fruitlessly seeking a financier for an expedition to find a new sea routes, yet has been repeatedly turned down. Perhaps it is time that we take a chance upon him. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be Spain. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Astronomy. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. Establish the Spanish Inquisition

Religious heresies lurk throughout these lands, undermining our power both in the eyes of the people and God. We must root them out wherever they hide... they'll never expect it... Establish the Ordinance of Alsnö

So as to encourage the growth of our homeland forces, all able-bodied men who would finance their own cavalry and equipment shall henceforth be exempt from paying tax and from conscription by force. Form the {1_GovtAdj} Jaguars and Eagles

As the Aztec {1_GovtTitle} grows, so too do her enemies. With the presence of other powerful foes in the world, we must reform the military with soldiers directly under the control of the {2_LeaderTitle}. The Jaguars and Eagles were already prestigious titles - they shall now also entail life-long service to the {1_GovtTitle}. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be the Aztecs. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least 5 Units with the Jaguar's [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]"Combat Bonus in Forest/Jungle"[ENDCOLOR] promotion. [ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_JFD_CAPTAIN] Captains. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]30 XP for all Units with the Jaguar's [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]"Combat Bonus in Forest/Jungle"[ENDCOLOR] promotion.

As the Aztec {1_GovtTitle} grows, so too do her enemies. With the presence of other powerful foes in the world, we must reform the military with soldiers directly under the control of the {2_LeaderTitle}. The Jaguars and Eagles were already prestigious titles - they shall now also entail life-long service to the {1_GovtTitle}. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]30 XP for all Units with the Jaguar's [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]"Combat Bonus in Forest/Jungle"[ENDCOLOR] promotion.
Create the Triple Alliance

From our lastest victories in battle, we have emerged as the undisputed ruler of these lands. Our petty neighbours must acknowledge this by joining us in the creation of a Triple Alliance. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be the Aztecs. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Civil Service. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be Allied with or be able to demand tribute from at least 3 City-States. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_JFD_DIGNITARY] Dignitaries. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Become known as 'the Triple Alliance.' [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain 3 more [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence (at Standard speed) per turn with City-States you could demand tribute from.

The Aztec Triple Alliance
{1_LeaderName} of the Aztecs has become a major regional power and has created a Triple Alliance between its City-State allies.
Capitalize on the Tin trade

Foreign peoples have come to our lands bearing precious stones and coin. We have the resource - tin - they say is vital for creation of their metal weapons and tools. So we should take the opportunity to request appropriate prices for our riches. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be the Celts. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least 2 Trade Routes. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Bronze Working. [ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game . [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+25% Naval Trade Route range. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Trade Routes yield +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.

Refine the Uilleann pipes

The most skilled musicians of our country have created a new musical instrument, based on older examples of the bagpipes. It is much more complex, and requires a skillful piper to play properly, but its sound and melody are unique. We should refine the design and make the Uilleann pipes our national instrument. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be the Celts. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least one Ceilidh Hall. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_JFD_INVENTOR] Inventors. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+15% [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Musician generation. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_CULTURE] Culture reward increases with the number of Ceilidh Halls and Amphitheatres.[ENDCOLOR]

Refine the Recurve Bow

Our people are born in the saddle. They are master horsemen and brilliant hunters, but our adversaries grow in strength. We must perfect our weapons in order to ensure our people's safety and let our warriors use their skill to the fullest. Let us hire or train additional Quipucamayocs to help us manage the finances of our {1_GovtTitleShort}. Establish the Chasqui System

The {1_GovtTitle} spans many leagues and while our road networks are extensive, it still takes time for important missives to travel throughout the empire. We hire Chasquis to remedy this: runners who will be able to deliver messages and objects quickly and efficiently. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be Inca. Ratify the Gayanashagowa

We are many peoples, scattered and divided. Yet at the same time we are also one people; the Haudenosaunee. Ratifying the Great Law of Peace will bind the {1_GovtTitle} together with a formal constitution and announce our unity to the world! [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_JFD_DIGNITARY] Dignitaries. Call a Mourning War against {1_Name}

It is a long-established tradition of our people to adopt those we capture into the {1_GovtTitleShort}. To replenish our numbers and ensure our ability to thrive and expand, we will call a Mourning War against {1_Name}. Construct Pok-Ta-Pok Ballcourts

The sport of Pok-Ta-Pok has long held great significance in Mayan culture, and it entertains our people greatly as well. Ordering the construction of Ballcourts and endorsing games throughout the {1_GovtTitleShort} will help promote our culture. Improve our Atlatls

Recent developments have rendered the Atlatl obsolete, this truly is a shame as they are much easier to produce. Perhaps with some time and investment, we will be able to improve on current designs and allow the Atlatl to compete with contemporary weapons, so that we will be able to continue supplying our soldiers with Atlatls. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be the Maya. Found the Amsterdamsche Wisselbank

The problem with metal coinage is that it is virtually impossible to make coins of equal weight at all mints. This makes moving wealth - the life blood of trade - difficult. A central bank would no doubt be helpful in relieving this waste. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be the Netherlands. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Renaissance era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_JFD_INVENTOR] Inventors. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive a free Bank in the Capital. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Financial District Buildings have +0.1 [ICON_JFD_DEVELOPMENT] Development.

Row.Text: Become a Gunpowder Empire

All our generals agree; gunpowder will revolutionise warfare. In order to ensure the Ottoman war machine remains the greatest, it is paramount that we commission for our army, muskets, and bombards, and train our soldiers in their use, beginning our transition into a Gunpowder Empire. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be the Ottomans. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Gunpowder. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_JFD_CAPTAIN] Captains. All our generals agree; gunpowder will revolutionise warfare. In order to ensure the Ottoman war machine remains the greatest, it is paramount that we commission for our army, muskets, and bombards, and train our soldiers in their use, beginning our transition into a Gunpowder Empire. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All Gunpowder and Siege Units receive +50% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength against Cities.
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivDesc} has enthusiastically adopted Gunpowder into his armies.
Merge with the Tukudeka

The Tukudeka - sheepeaters - are nomadic tribespeople that wander our lands. They are Shoshone, and are cordial with our people. Bringing them into the fold would ensure their bonds remain attached to us and allow us to make good use of their mastery in hunting. ------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Shoshone. Implement Amabutho Conscription

Our troops are poorly organized and our enemies are feeling envious of our rich and fertile lands. Yet our tribes are filled with strong and young men, fresh and eager to see battle. Conscripting the young and re-organizing our army will ensure that our military does not flounder. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be the Zulu. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive an additional [ICON_JFD_LEVIES] Levy whenever one is called.
